de.hebis.it.hds.gnd.in.subfields

Class DataField

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.AbstractMap<K,V>
      • java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.util.List<java.lang.String>>
        • de.hebis.it.hds.gnd.in.subfields.DataField
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.List<java.lang.String>>

    public class DataField
extends java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.util.List<java.lang.String>>
    Representation of marcXML datafield with some methods to help processing subfields.
    Version:
    30.03.2017 uh initial
    Author:
    Uwe Reh (uh), HeBIS-IT
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Detail

      • storeValues

        public void storeValues(java.lang.String subFieldCode,
                        java.lang.String fieldName,
                        boolean repeatable,
                        java.lang.String regExFilter)
        Store the value(s) of an (repeated)subfield into the solr document
        Parameters:
        subFieldCode - Code of the subfield to select
        fieldName - Name of the field to store in (schema:...)
        repeatable - Is the subfield be repeatable
        regExFilter - Optional regex to skip unwanted entries

      • getFirstValue

        public java.lang.String getFirstValue(java.lang.String subFieldCode)
        Helper to extract the first occurrence of the subfield
        Parameters:
        subFieldCode - Code of the subfield to select
        Returns:
        The first value of the subfield or NULL, if the subfield isn't provided or empty.

      • getValues

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getValues(java.lang.String subFieldCode)
        Helper to extract the first occurrence of the subfield
        Parameters:
        subFieldCode - Code of the subfield to select
        Returns:
        The value list of the (repeated) subfield. If the subfield isn't provided a empty list will returned.

      • addSubField

        public void addSubField(javax.xml.stream.XMLStreamReader rawreader)
        Pack the XML subfield value(s) into an List (internal representation)
        Parameters:
        rawreader - The stax reader

      • getSub9SubField

        public java.lang.String getSub9SubField(char extentionCode)
        Get a DNB pseudo subfield.
        This extension to 'normal' fields is coded by an leading character and colon to the value.
        Parameters:
        extentionCode - Additional identifier. (mostly '4')
        Returns:
        The stripped value or NULL if the requested pseudo subfield isn'present.

      • newList

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> newList(java.lang.String... data)
        Build a list of variable amount of arguments.
        Parameters:
        data - One or more strings
        Returns:
        A list of the given strings

      • storeMultiValued

        public void storeMultiValued(java.lang.String fieldName,
                             java.lang.String value)
        Hide the underlying document and avoid duplicate entries.
        Parameters:
        fieldName - Name of the search field as defined in schema.xml
        value - The data to add. NULL is ignored

      • storeUnique

        public void storeUnique(java.lang.String fieldName,
                        java.lang.String value)
        Hide the underlying document and check the 'unique' constraint
        Parameters:
        fieldName - Name of the search field as defined in schema.xml
        value - The data to add. NULL is ignored

      • getFieldValues

        public java.util.Collection<java.lang.Object> getFieldValues(java.lang.String fieldName)
        Hide the underlying document and check the 'unique' constraint
        If the field is already used, the new value will be ignored.
        Parameters:
        fieldName - Name of the search field as defined in schema.xml
        Returns:
        The values stored in the search field or NULL if the field does not exist.

      • replaceUnique

        public void replaceUnique(java.lang.String fieldName,
                          java.lang.String value)
        Hide the underlying document and check the 'unique' constraint
        If the field is already used, the old entry will be replaced with the new value.
        Parameters:
        fieldName - Name of the search field as defined in schema.xml
        value - The data to add

      • getRecordId

        public java.lang.String getRecordId()
        Returns:
        The Id of the current record (stored in this DataField)
